gpu_set_texfilter_ext: This function can be used to set the linear interpolation for a single sampler "slot" when using Shaders in GameMaker Studio 2. When this is enabled (true) the sampler texture will be smoothed and if this is disabled (false) then images will be drawn based on the nearest pixel. The default value is that set by the Global Game Options for your game, or that set using the function gpu_set_texfilter().
NOTE: This setting will be over-ridden by the value set when calling the function gpu_set_texfilter().
NOTE: On the HTML5 target, this function will only work with WebGL enabled.
